X.i.6.K.3.b
.
Requesting Examinations for Pregnant Participants
MSCs must include the following remarks in any examination request for a pregnant IDES participant:
Please be advised that this individual has indicated that she is currently pregnant.Â  If the examining physician determines that this examination (or any part of this examination) is medically contraindicated, please clearly indicate which parts of the examination were not completed due to the pregnancy.
Further, the examiner should indicate the earliest point (in days following
delivery) that the examination may be safely completed.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section K - Special Situations Related to Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES)
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section K
